Combat
Hit Points: 168 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Barbarian: 26 (strength; trained)
Armor: Chain Shirt Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Composite Longbow (+19 1d8+3 P [Crit +d10] R100'; dexterity; expert); Longsword (+21 1d8+7 S/P; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Brutality: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Fury Instinct: Increases added rage damage to 6
Goodies Composite Longbow: +1 Attack and damage
Goodies Longsword: +3 Attack and damage
Orc Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Falchion; Greataxe)/Weapon Familiarity (Orc Weapons)
Specialization Ability: Has increased Instinct Ability Rage effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Brutality: Critical hits with a melee weapon or unarmed attack inflict its critical specialization effect during rage
Cleave: (R) Makes a melee Strike on an adjacent foe after killing a foe or knocking one unconscious during rage
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of up to level 10
Intimidating Glare: Can use a glare to Demoralize
Intimidating Prowess: +1 to Demoralize when physically menacing the target
Orc Ferocity: (R) Retains 1 Hit Point and increases the wounded condition by 1 when brought to 0 Hit Points once per day
Orc Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon orc weapons
Power Attack: (2) Melee Strike inflicts 2 extra damage dice and counts as 2 Strikes for the multiple attack penalty
Rage: (1) Gains 14 temporary Hit Points and +6 HP melee damage, or +3 HP with an agile weapon, and suffers -1 Armor Class and loss of concentration actions for 1 min; requires 1 min between rages
Sudden Charge: (2) Makes a melee Strike after 2 Strides
Thrash: (1) Inflicts 10 HP bludgeoning plus specialization damage on a grabbed foe (save basic Fortitude) during rage
Titan Wrestler: Can use Disarm, Grapple, Shove, and Trip on creatures up to 2 sizes larger
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +20 (constitution; master); Reflex: +18 (dexterity; expert); Will: +16 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Raging Resistance (Fury): Has resistance 7 to physical weapon damage during rage
Magic
Spell Slots: A1: 1; A2: 1; A3: 1; AC1: 2 Attack: Arcane: +14 (intelligence; trained) Spell DC: Arcane: 24 (intelligence; trained)
Spells:
Magic Weapon (A1 Tra): (2) Touched weapon gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min
Prestidigitation (A0 Evo): 1
Spider Climb (A2 Tra): (2) Touched gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 1 hr)
Magic Notes:
Basic Wizard Spellcasting: Knows 1 1st-level, 1 2nd-level, and 1 3rd-level arcane spell
Wizard Dedication: Spell Trained (Arcane)/Can prepare 2 arcane cantrips each day
Arcane Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
Wizard Dedication: Owns a spellbook with 4 arcane cantrips
